description: This file is a layout component for a front-end web application built with React and TypeScript. It sets up the main layout structure with a Topbar and Sidebar, and includes metadata for the page. It imports styling CSS files and other components, and renders the primary HTML structure for the app shell.

methods.name: RootLayout
methods.description: Functional React component that renders the main layout structure of the application, including the header and sidebar, and handles rendering of children components.
